subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Tina Charles scored 16 points helping top-ranked Connecticut set an N.C.A.A. record by winning its 71st straight game in the semifinals of the Big East women’s tournament.
snippet: Tina Charles scored 16 points helping top-ranked Connecticut set an N.C.A.A. record by winning its 71st straight game in the semifinals of the Big East women’s tournament.
